name: Rebind (TheAsh, Deive_Ex, Steef23)
description:
You are a hacker who just hacked into military-grade robot and you start rampaging in the city, the police are trying to stop your robot while the cyber forces are trying to sabotage your connection.

Shoot the enemies and dodge bullets while your keyboard keys get disabled, play without some keys or risk rebinding game while the bullets keep coming!

Made for GMTK20 game jam, with the theme "Out of control"

Programing: Felipe Carmo Cavaco, @Deive_Ex

2D Artist: Steven van der Werf, @Steaf321

3D Artist: Callmecyborg

Audio Designer: David Lockhart @kimiwav

Game Designer: Chen Ashkenazi
